Entries.3790211/F/f Aubrey 1500: 50s/7 28/farmer 10 27 3 Aubrey 6 27 3 RM.Victor 4 27 1/skippable/move farmer -2 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/shake Aubrey 500/emote Aubrey 12/pause 500/speak RM.Victor "Looks like we're done here. You can leave now, Aubrey."/emote Aubrey 28/speak Aubrey "Are you kidding?! You don't care at all?$2"/pause 200/speak RM.Victor "I just don't think @ should hear about this."/emote Aubrey 8/pause 200/faceDirection Aubrey 1/textAboveHead Aubrey "Oh..."/pause 200/message "I can leave if you'd like..."/pause 200/faceDirection Aubrey 3/speak Aubrey "Oh my god, you're SO two-faced, Victor.$4#$b#Obviously you wouldn't want to look bad in front of @, right?$4"/pause 200/emote RM.Victor 12/pause 200/speak RM.Victor "I do not care.#$b#What I do care about is our private bussiness not being aired out to everybody in the town..."/pause 500/textAboveHead Aubrey "Oh yeah?"/pause 1000/faceDirection Aubrey 1/message "Okay. I'll let you guys be. Sorry for interrupting!"/speak Aubrey "No, no, I need you to stay!#$b#Let me tell you about how Victor is really like!$4"/textAboveHead RM.Victor "*sigh*"/emote farmer 28/pause 100/speak Aubrey "Hid so many things he's done, helped him avoid the police... And the gang members!$4"/speak RM.Victor "Okay, Aubrey.$4"/faceDirection Aubrey 3/speak Aubrey "I had to lie to all those people that I don't know who you are!$4#$b#As they were knocking on my door, fuming with anger!$4#$b#I was so damn scared, and you were passed out on MY couch!$4"/shake RM.Victor 500/shake Aubrey 500/faceDirection Aubrey 1/speak Aubrey "Not a single contribution to the rent, not a single thank you either!$4"/textAboveHead RM.Victor "Aubrey..."/pause 500/speak Aubrey "You know I wasn't even that close with Jordan when I begged him to let us stay with him?$4#$b#I did it anyway because Victor's life was on the line!$4"/pause 1000/emote Aubrey 40/pause 200/textAboveHead Aubrey "Still not a single thank you!"/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/speak RM.Victor "I think it's time for you to go, @.#$b#Aubrey is having a psychosis episode. None of it is real."/faceDirection Aubrey 3/shake Aubrey 500/textAboveHead Aubrey "PSYCHOSIS???"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/end
